Text.val: this is a batch job that starts every night and produces a document
for a client with all changes in own juggement changes
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
25.07.2012 GB SCR17464 Replaced UFB525 MagicConcat by GB730 AppendFile to build the final XML
23.03.2011 GB SCR116261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
12.04.2006 AS SCR#10927 fixed open modes for table CLNT
18.08.2004 SH SCR6841 Extended selection of CLHS rows for report type = SVA
with CLHS_OWNJUDGLIMIT = Y and CLHS_TEXTCODE1 <>
04.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
04.04.2004 SH SCR5447 Changed selection of CLHS rows regaring to
- COUT202_REPORTTYPE ( possible types now = 'SVA', 'CLA', 'FLA')
30.01.2004 SH SCR5417 Changed writing of endtag from 'SVA type="ownjud to </SAL>
29.01.2004 AS changed (hardcoded) parameter reporttype string for BXA900 to
'SVA type="ownjudg"' (was: 'SVA)
11.12.2003 SH SCR4925 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ENCODING with 0
13.11.2003 SH SCR4779 Added new argument to list for BXA007X
01.08.2003 SH SCR4019 Implemented missing dynamically sort on CLHS
- by CLHS_DEBH_NO or CLHS_DEBC_DEBC, see SCR for details
04.06.2003 SH SCR3676 Added ADMNO/CLNTNO to argument list for the call
- to "BXA007X-OVERVIEW UPDATES"
11.03.2003 SH SCR2566 Added to new arguments for GB007 if job is running on
- AS400 to turn job to message wait
//22.10.2002 SH SCR2393 Add new argument to end of list for call to BXA900
//19-06-2002 JP change output picture of CLHS_DATCHANGED SCR #1516
30.04.2002 SH SCR95 Wrap any output with UFB535, to replace special XML-Charater
29.04.2002 SH SCR759 Implemented errorhandling and a proper handling of
- directories for Templates and Outputfiles
08.04.2002 SH SCR1059 replaced hardcoded pathnames for the location of the
- templates, used now the pathname from the virtual 'v_dir_template'
07.03.2002 SH SCR952 Set Allow Event to 'N', all tasks
-- SCR#717 --> 31.01.2002 SH (Move Check to table CLHS one task
higher. This task doesn't open a transaction,
then we have no problems with sequenz numbers
locks and unnecessary calls to GB003.)
-- SCR#720 --> 31.01.2002 SH (New index on LinkQuery 'CLHS')
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES =========
-- Use PI.OUTDIR as OutputDirectory for XML Files
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- See also DB SQL WhereClause
-- Only if there are rows in CLHS XML has to be produced
-- Set SQL_WhereClause and OrderBy to obtain CLHS rows

ExpSyntax.val: ' and CLHS_TYPE = '''&'C'&''' and CLHS_OWNJUDGLIMIT = '''&'Y'&''' and CLHS_OWNJUDGLIMIT = '''&'Y'&''' and CLHS_TEXTCODE1 <> '''&Trim ({1,6})&''''

Text.val: -- Set report type string for BXA900
-- Build final XML File
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLHS_DEBC_DEBC, CLHS_DEBH_NO,CLHS_DATCHANGED,CLHS_LIMITOLD, CLHS_LIMITNEW , CLHS_ADMNO,CLHS_CLNTNO,CLHS_OWNJUDGLIMIT,CLHS_DATPRINTED,CLHS_CURRENCYOLD,CLHS_CURRENCYNEW from :3/CLHS where CLHS_ADMNO=:1 and CLHS_CLNTNO=:2 and CLHS_DATPRINTED is null :5 order by :4 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: This task is based on SQL query ! ! !
convert CLHS_DATCHANGED to alpha format DD.MM.YYYY
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
